explanation: [0-0] A young woman in a black top sits between a man and a young boy, all three barefoot. The woman holds a plastic bag in her left hand, reaches into it with her right hand, and looks down. The young man in the blue top on the right also sits on the ground, holding a mobile phone in his right hand, extending his left hand forward, and looking at the woman beside him. A little boy in black clothes on the left stands next to the woman, placing his left hand on her leg, smiling and looking forward.
[0-2] Then the woman picks up a piece of food from the plastic bag with her right hand and puts it into her mouth. The little boy on the left and the man on the right both watch her movements.
[0-2] Then the woman picks up a piece of food from the plastic bag with her right hand and puts it into her mouth. The little boy on the left and the man on the right both watch her movements.

[2-7] Immediately afterward, the man reaches into the plastic bag with his left hand, takes out a piece of food, puts it in his mouth and takes a bite. Then he looks at the food in his left hand with a puzzled expression on his face. The woman eats the food while shaking her body constantly, and then puts another piece of food into her mouth.
